---
title: "Bridged USDT"
description: USDT tokens bridged to Arthera
---

Several DeFi projects need a bridged USDT to operate, this is the official USDT token info :

- Token contract address on Arthera Mainnet: **[0x6C45E28A76977a96e263f84F95912B47F927B687](https://explorer.arthera.net/token/0x6C45E28A76977a96e263f84F95912B47F927B687?tab=contract)**
- Token contract address on Arthera Testnet: **[0x185fd3ef4Eb1c013A6e8Eb2E76F8C451Adfb4745](https://explorer-test.arthera.net/token/0x185fd3ef4Eb1c013A6e8Eb2E76F8C451Adfb4745)**
- Token symbol: **USDT**
- Token decimals: **6**

You can view the USDT token [contract source code and ABI on the explorer](https://explorer.arthera.net/token/0x6C45E28A76977a96e263f84F95912B47F927B687?tab=contract).

:::info

_Latest update: [April 23, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs/issues/103)_

:::
